DrugName: Pain reliever (e.g., acetaminophen or ibuprofen) to manage pain and inflammation associated with liver laceration
Antibiotics (e.g., ciprofloxacin or metronidazole) as a precautionary measure due to potential infection risk
Anti-nausea medication (e.g., ondansetron) to alleviate symptoms of nausea and vomiting
Multivitamins with minerals to support overall health and recovery
Vitamin K injections to help prevent bleeding complications in the liver
